lead_paragraph: Heavy smog that blanketed northern China at the weekend cleared somewhat on Monday, with flights in Beijing back to normal, but it was likely only to be a brief respite with more choking smog expected to return to the wintry north within 24 hours.
snippet: Heavy smog that blanketed northern China at the weekend cleared somewhat on Monday, with flights in Beijing back to normal, but it was likely only to be a brief respite with more choking smog expected to return to the wintry north within 24 hours....

headline.main: Beijing Enjoys Brief Respite, but Choking Smog to Return on Tuesday
headline.print_headline: Beijing Enjoys Brief Respite, but Choking Smog to Return on Tuesday
